entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Uranium City
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:26 PM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 46 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:23 PM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:23 PM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:23 PM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023
